page.syntax: Index_Number as N = IndexNumber(Name as C)

argument.name: Index_Number
argument.description: The number of the index named. -1 if the index name is not in the column list.

page.description: Get the index of a Index from the name.
page.discussion: The IndexNumber() method gets the subscript of the requested index name in the Index array property.
page.example: dim TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo dim IndexInfo as SQL::IndexInfo TableInfo.Name = "MyTable" IndexInfo.Name = "Primary_Key" IndexInfo.PrimaryKey = .t. ? TableInfo.AddIndex(IndexInfo) = 1 ? TableInfo.IndexNumber("Primary_Key") = 1
